ygData.subject: Re: testeqnews.txt (Quasimeta)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am on The Rathe, and i have withness the arrival of Daughter of Innoruk. I was on my way back from Solusek Eye (God i love that dongeon), and in the
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> On the other hand they make some NPC's impossible kill. There is a
> developing storyline quest starting up in Neriak with an NPC claiming to be
> the Daughter of Innoruk (sp?). I have read several reports that groups have
> attacked this NPC and been unable to inflict no damage at all even though
> she is a green con.

I am on The Rathe, and i have withness the arrival of Daughter of Innoruk.

I was on my way back from Solusek Eye (God i love that dongeon), and in the
common land, outside the Nectulos forest, a Evil group where going to Befallen
to retreave a armor piece for the Daughter.

As always, over guildsay and all, Every lvl 50 or so where there to try to take
a piece of her. Not only they did no damage, But she was calling over the "Power
of Innoruuk" to insta-kill them... Not nice to see lvl 50 drop in one cast.

No Spell can hurt her, but it can be charmed ! If you can charm and command the
daughter of a god, does that make you a god ?

Was funny to see the Daugter of Innoruuk sit while everyone that where slashing
on her just stop. Don't worry, i only did it twice, did not want to upset the
"Power of Innoruuk" (And the GM).

ps : Fear and Chain also work on gm-npc.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

"I believe that Ronald Reagan will someday make this country what it once was --
an arctic wilderness."
-- Steve Martin
